## EventEmitter class

An event emitter to facilitate emitter and listening for events.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class EventEmitter<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [events](./flipclock.eventemitter.events.md) | <code>protected</code> | [Event\_2](./flipclock.event_2.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, any&gt;\[\] |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [emit(key, args)](./flipclock.eventemitter.emit.md) |  | Emit an event. |
|  [off(key)](./flipclock.eventemitter.off.md) |  | Stop listening for an event by key, or with a key a specific function. |
|  [on(key, fn)](./flipclock.eventemitter.on.md) |  | Listen for an event. |
|  [once(key, fn)](./flipclock.eventemitter.once.md) |  | Listen for an event once. |
|  [unwatch()](./flipclock.eventemitter.unwatch.md) |  | Unwatch and remove all the events. |
